title: Put large content in text item, the tips show the content in one line
description: When saving and putting the mouse on the text item, the expected result is that the tips show in the given format. However, the actual result is that the tips show in one line.
OB: When putting large content in a text item, the tips should show the content in the given format, not in one line.
SR: Ensure that the tips for text items display the content in the expected format, rather than in a single line.
